text: Jordan Bernt Peterson (born June 12, 1962) is a Canadian clinical psychologist and a retired professor of psychology at University of Toronto. He studies abnormal, social, and personality psychology. He is interested in the psychology of religious and ideological belief. His views are generally described as conservative. ==Views== Peterson criticises political correctness, Marxism, and postmodernism.
